title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 81-2.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 81-2.1 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Parent corporation means a domestic life insurance company, domestic corporation subject to article 43 of the Insurance Law, or domestic retirement system subject to article 46 of the Insurance Law, that directly or indirectly, controls another institution. (b) All other terms used herein shall have the same meanings prescribed in section
107
and article 17 of the Insurance Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
81-2.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
